headline: 3 Reasons MTD is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Mettler-Toledo shares have sunk to $1,163, producing a disappointing 7.1% loss - worse than the S&P 500’s 1.9% drop. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: Research Tools & Consumables Stocks Q1 Recap: Benchmarking Mettler-Toledo (NYSE:MTD)
summary: Looking back on research tools & consumables stocks’ Q1 earnings, we examine this quarter’s best and worst performers, including Mettler-Toledo (NYSE:MTD) and its peers.
